name: Raymond SHELTON, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, Department of Corrections, Appellees
name_abbreviation: Shelton v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Raymond SHELTON, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, Department of Corrections, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 2 nd day of August, 2000, probable jurisdiction is herewith noted and the order appealed is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
755 A.2d 1293
Raymond SHELTON, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, Department of Corrections, Appellees.
No. 68 M.D. Appeal Docket 2000.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 2, 2000.
